item.title: How to Scrape the Web
item.description: From scraping Amazon product reviews, to individual product SKUs and more, automatic web crawling is still a very common business need today. The ability to utilize a cluster of workers to automatically turn html into meaningful data is a very real business proposition. There are many ways to scale automatic web crawling. With the advent of Kubernetes and Docker Swarm, running a replica of 100x containers is very easy to do.
